welcome.title: MBTI Personality Quiz
welcome.description: Discover your true self with questions personalized just for you. Uncover insights about your strengths, relationships, and career path.

dataCollection.title: Let's Personalize Your Experience
dataCollection.subtitle: This helps us tailor the questions to your life stage and interests.
dataCollection.ageDescription: Age helps us understand your life stage and experiences.
dataCollection.occupationDescription: Your work context helps create relevant scenarios.
dataCollection.genderDescription: This helps us consider different social perspectives.
dataCollection.hobbiesQuestion: What are your hobbies and interests?
dataCollection.hobbiesDescription: Add up to 5 interests as tags to help us create personalized examples for you.
dataCollection.hobbiesPlaceholder: e.g. Hiking, Gaming, Reading, Photography, Cooking

nameScreen.title: What's your name?
nameScreen.description: Let us know your name so we can personalize your results.
nameScreen.finalStepHint: Almost done! Your personalized MBTI results are just one step away.

tagInput.noTagsPlaceholder: Add tags using Enter or comma
tagInput.inputPlaceholder: Type and press Enter or comma to add tag
tagInput.instructions: Type your interests and press Enter or comma to add them as tags. Maximum {{maxTags}} tags.

results.title: Your Personality Type
results.subtitle: Based on your responses, here's your personality analysis:
results.chatSubtitle: Chat with me about your {{personalityType}} personality type
results.disclaimer: This MBTI assessment is for educational and self-discovery purposes only. It's not a clinical diagnosis. Consider this as a starting point for understanding yourself better.
results.analysisSubtitle: AI-powered insights based on your {{personalityType}} personality type

medicalWelcome.title: AI Health Assistant
medicalWelcome.description: Get personalized health insights powered by AI. Describe your symptoms and receive intelligent guidance on possible conditions and next steps.
medicalWelcome.disclaimer: This AI assistant is for informational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical care. Always consult healthcare professionals for medical concerns.
medicalWelcome.emergencyWarning: If you're experiencing a medical emergency, call emergency services immediately.

symptomCollection.title: Tell us about your health
symptomCollection.subtitle: This information helps our AI provide more accurate assessments.

primarySymptom.title: What's your main health concern?
primarySymptom.description: Please describe your primary symptom in detail.
primarySymptom.placeholder: e.g., severe headache, stomach pain, difficulty breathing

age.title: How old are you?
age.description: Age helps us understand your health context and risk factors.

gender.title: What's your gender?
gender.description: This helps us consider gender-specific health factors.

additionalSymptoms.title: Are you experiencing any other symptoms?
additionalSymptoms.description: Add any additional symptoms you're experiencing.

medications.title: What medications are you currently taking?
medications.description: This helps us consider potential medication interactions or side effects.
medications.placeholder: e.g., aspirin, blood pressure medication, vitamins

allergies.title: Do you have any known allergies?
allergies.description: Please include medication allergies and other known allergies.

medicalHistory.title: Do you have any relevant medical history?
medicalHistory.description: Include any chronic conditions, previous surgeries, or relevant health history.
medicalHistory.placeholder: e.g., diabetes, high blood pressure, recent surgery

dynamicQuestion.whyThisQuestion: Why am I being asked this?
dynamicQuestion.oneThingAtATime: We ask one question at a time for more accurate answers.

diagnosisResults.title: Hello {{name}}, here are your health insights
diagnosisResults.subtitle: Based on your symptom: {{symptom}}

disclaimer.title: Important Medical Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: This AI assessment is for informational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical diagnosis, treatment, or advice. Always consult qualified healthcare providers for any medical concerns.

emergency.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Emergency Warning
emergency.callToAction: If you're experiencing any of these symptoms, seek immediate medical attention or call emergency services.

diagnosisResults.noDiagnoses: No diagnoses available at this time. Please try again or consult a healthcare professional.

medicalChat.title: Medical Q&A
medicalChat.subtitle: Ask questions about your assessment results

welcome.title: Ask about your health
welcome.subtitle: I'm here to help answer questions about your symptom assessment and possible conditions.

suggestedQuestions.title: Suggested questions
suggestedQuestions.prevention: How can I prevent this in the future?

error.message: I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again or consult a healthcare professional.

input.placeholder: Ask about your symptoms or diagnosis...

medicalChat.disclaimer: This chat is for informational purposes only and not a substitute for professional medical advice.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.checkingQuestions: Unable to check for additional questions

fallback.reasoning: Unable to complete AI analysis. Please consult a healthcare professional.
fallback.nextStep: Schedule an appointment with a healthcare provider

error.networkError: Network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.
error.apiError: Something went wrong. Please try again.
error.validationError: Please answer all questions Before submitting.
error.genericError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

chat.placeholder: Ask me anything about your personality type...
suggestedQuestions: What careers would suit me well?
What should I work on improving?
chat.welcomeMessage: Hi {{name}}! I'm here to answer your questions about your {{personalityType}} personality type. Feel free to ask me anything about your strengths, relationships, career paths, or personal growth!
chat.errorMessage: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble answering that question right now. Please try again or ask me something else about your personality type.

octagonChart.title: Internal Octagon Evaluation
octagonChart.subtitle: Comprehensive analysis of your MBTI preference distribution
octagonChart.coloredArea: Colored area shows your unique personality profile
octagonChart.eightDimensions: 8 dimensions show both sides of each MBTI pair
